channel.title: Error connecting to server!
channel.description: Ok so i have spent hours searching for a way to connect other users to my server. i havent tested logging in on my client but i attemped to log on the moparscape client and wasn't aable to log into my server. i have a dlink 624 router and quadruple cheked my port forwarding. When i check my ports on canyouseeme.org I get an error message that says the connection was rejected. I went in advane security settings in windows firewall and mad a port exception. my goal is to make canyouseeme.org say the the connection was successful. CAN ANYONE HELP ME!?!

im pretty sure that i have the right port: 43594
